original_text: He replied, “If you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mulberry tree, ‘Be uprooted and planted in the sea,’ and it will obey you.
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 너희에게 겨자씨 한 알만한 믿음이 있었더라면 이 뽕나무더러 뿌리가 뽑혀 바다에 심기어라 하였을 것이요 그것이 너희에게 순종하였으리라

sentences.original_text: "If you have faith as small as a mustard seed,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 너희에게 겨자씨 한 알만한 믿음이 있으면

sentences.original_text: you can say to this mulberry tree,
'Be uprooted and planted in the sea,'
